channel.title: OSFM on David Hamp-Gonsalves
channel.description: Recent content in OSFM on David Hamp-Gonsalves

item.title: Live Metadata Handling Using OSMF (3/3)
item.description: This is the third post in a series about injecting JSON based metadata into a live RTP streams using Wowza Media Server, Adobe Flex and OSMF. What We’ve Built So far in the previous posts(1,2) we setup Wowza and created a module which will inject our JSON metadata into our live RTP stream. Then we created a flash object to trigger the event injection with our metadata from the browser.
